DOC.brief_summary: Study to determine the safety and efficacy of Mobic® ampoules in the initiation of treatment of painful exacerbations of osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis and other similar painful inflammatory conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Mobic® Ampoules in the Initiation of Treatment of Painful Exacerbations of Osteoarthritis, Rheumatoid Arthritis and Other Similar Painful Inflammatory Conditions
DOC.criteria: Painful acute exacerbations of inflammatory rheumatism (rheumatoid arthritis and ankylosing spondylitis), painful acute exacerbations of osteoarthritis and other similar conditions requiring acute treatment with an antiinflammatory drug
